thread.title: Japanese Brand XLARGE Releases New ‘Beavis and Butt-Head’ Collection
thread.title_full: Japanese Brand XLARGE Releases New ‘Beavis and Butt-Head’ Collection

author: Jesse Bernard
title: Japanese Brand XLARGE Releases New ‘Beavis and Butt-Head’ Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
Japanese brand XLARGE takes an interesting direction with their latest collection which champions American sitcom characters Beavis and Butt-Head. The capsule collection follows XLARGE’s recent collaboration with Japanese fine artist Yayoi Kusama for a Spring 2017 drop.
The collection which was also designed by Beavis and Butt-Head, creator Mike Judge, features a hoodie, baseball cap, three t-shirts and a coach jacket, each nodding to the iconic ’90s cartoon. Created by Mike Judge in 1992, Beavis and Butt-Head began life as a short film before MTV picked it up to air as a series which ran from 1993 until 1997. The full collection is available now online and at select XLARGE stockists:
Shop Now In other fashion news, N.D.G unveiled its lookbook for its forthcoming “Vadou” collection.
